name: Background removal
description: The simplest way to remove image backgrounds through API

api_methods.name: Upload File
api_methods.description: Use this endpoint to remove background from file uploaded. The response would be in base64 formate. You can goto this website and paste the base64 string to get the image https://codebeautify.org/base64-to-image-converter. Or else one can do it programmatically.

utterances.utterance: Can you remove the background from this photo of my dog?
I need the background removed from this image of a sunset.
Please remove the background from this picture of a flower.
Could you take out the background from this photo of a city skyline?
Remove the background from this image of a mountain.
I’d like the background removed from this picture of a beach.
Can you eliminate the background from this photo of a forest?
Please take the background out of this image of a car.
Could you remove the background from this picture of a bird?
I need the background removed from this photo of a family gathering.
